Reviews.Title: “awesome”
Reviews.Author: Lisa H
Reviews.Content: We ended up staying two nights.The rooms were very clean. The bed was very comfortable.The staff was extremely friendly.Breakfast was even good! Just mins. from shopping malls and eateries. Within 5 mins. from the Kennel club and Poker Room.After staying in other hotel rooms we wished we had stayed here.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: l1eve
Reviews.Content: We had a great one night stay in the Quality Inn. Staff was friendly, welcoming and helpfull, and knew what they were doing. The rooms are good, spacious and clean. The location on the main road is ideal for visiting the speedway and the beach is a 10 mins drive away. Plenty of places to eat in the immediate neighboorhood. Breakfast was good, plenty of choice; breakfast area was on the smaller side, but this is only a small detail. I believe the parking does not provide the same amount of spaces as the amount of rooms; this might be an issue when the hotel is fully booked. If we would ever visit Daytona again, we would definitely consider staying in this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: KSC77
Reviews.Content: It is not fancy, but it was clean, conveniently located off I 95, nearby to lots of restaurants, etc. There were some small issues with the settings knob on the fridge, and the bolt lock sticking a bit, but nothing that would change me from staying there again. For a budget minded traveler, this is a good choice!

Reviews.Title: “Best stay”
Reviews.Author: anggov
Reviews.Content: The gentleman Will that checked us in was a great help with directions for local area entertainment and recommended a great place in Ormondbeach to have dinner, Susie that does breakfast in the morning was also always a great help and keep the breakfast area clean and fresh at all times... Both employees always had a smile and was a pleasure to speak to know matter how early or late in the evening... the remainder of staff was also great.... would recommend all family and friends to stay....

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay during the race!”
Reviews.Author: McComb_family
Reviews.Content: Hotel is right across the street from Daytona International Speedway. This is the only hotel we stay at while in Daytona. We have stayed at this hotel every time there is a race. Great improvements over the years. Free Internet, free hot breakfast. The staff was excellent. They went out of there way to exceed my expectations.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: East Northport, New York, United States
Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay for speedway.....”
Reviews.Author: Peter D
Reviews.Content: Another great stay at the Quality Inn. Best place to stay when visiting Daytona International Speedway. Right across the street makes it so convienient when going to the race track. Hotel staff is great. Free hot breakfast gets the day off to a fantastic start.......

Reviews.Title: “Race Fans Love It!!!”
Reviews.Author: Deborah H
Reviews.Content: We have enjoyed the hotel for over 9 years and were pleaseantly surprised with the new upgrades.The new general manager Deborah was fantastic! She took a genuine interest in the guests and was always available. Rooms were clean and breakfast buffet offered many new items. We love the convenience of staying across from the track, yet it is also a prime location to other attractions and restaurants in the area.Thanks for a great time and we will see you next year!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay during races and more!”
Reviews.Author: FunnCruiser
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at this hotel for 9 years now and really cannot complain! Love that the owners make upgrades to make things better! The staff is always pleasant and our room has always been clean! The staff is always very accommodating also! Only thing I wish - that the breakfast in the morning went a little longer!! We always end up sleeping in!! The beds are comfortable too!! Thanks Rupesh and staff for another great time in Daytona!! See you again next year!

Reviews.Title: “Cleanliness and friendly caring staff = The Perfect Stay.”
Reviews.Author: BossyBennett
Reviews.Content: We have been coming here for the 4th of July weekend Nascar Race for 3 years. It is located in the perfect spot for the race, the staff is friendly and caring. The rooms are clean and if you need anything extra they always try to accommodate you. The breakfast is fantastic! Espicially the waffle and pancake maker. The price is a "wee" bit high but Location Location Location is the reason we dont mind paying. Will be here again next year! Thank you !! L. Bennett St Pete,FL

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in Daytona!”
Reviews.Author: SnootsFranklin
Reviews.Content: Loved my stay here from the second I walked in the lobby (amazing!). Staff is super friendly and always addressed me by name. Hotel is right across from the speedway, but we were in town for the beach which is why two things about it were great 1) no towel stinginess, they kept them stocked & clean and gladly provided more 2) super high water pressure to really help blast the sand out of your hair at the end of the day. Room itself was great, microwave & mini fridge came in handy and TV was a new flat screen. Tons of great resturaunts in the area as well. We had a great trip and we WILL be back again.

Reviews.Title: “Room was not air conditioned effectively”
Reviews.Author: Sara D
Reviews.Content: This was a clean, fine looking motel. Our biggest complaint is that the a/c unit near the door blew directly on the closest bed and didn't seem to travel throughout the rest of the room. As a result, the people sleeping in the close bed freeze and get a sore throat from the freezing air, and the people sleeping in the far bed (and those in the bathroom) are hot. We did enjoy our short visit with the kind woman working the breakfast in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay”
Reviews.Author: aroundtheworld008
Reviews.Content: Although we stayed for only one night but the experience overall was very good. Room was small but perfectly fit for us ( very clean). Bed was very comfortable, breakfast was nice, staffs were very friendly. What more could you ask for? I would definitely stay here again if I come back to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: Tonya W
Reviews.Content: I had a wonderful experience when staying at the Quality Inn, very nice gentlemen Will at the front desk helped my children with the nternet access. He went above and beyond his front desk duties and was very much apperciated. I would stay again when in town. The rooms where very clean and well keep..

Reviews.Title: “Florida trip”
Reviews.Author: Donna G
Reviews.Content: Amanda was very pleasant and helpful in checking us in and providing information. Lynn was very pleasant and accommodating at breakfast every morning. Deborah was helpful for my daughter's wedding stay in November. We will definitely stay here again, especially if Lynn is there for breakfast and Amanda and Deborah are at the desk. These people are excellent and really made us feel comfortable. Thank you! Donna and Marty Texas We stayed June 14 thru June 16,2012 Room 132

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay; really friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: suey68
Reviews.Content: We stayed for one night at this hotel. We don't normally stay at Quality Inns - but the positive reviews swayed our decision. Our room was very clean (a little musty smelling at first, but once we started the a/c, it was fine). The furnishings seemed updated. Nice features: fridge, microwave, coffeemaker in room, great flat screen TV with many channels, VERY comfortable bed!! The staff was unbelievably friendly. Everyone, from the 2 front desk people I encountered to the wonderfully nice lady who helped with breakfast (she was serving people who needed some additional help!!) to the woman who appeared to be a manager, were friendly. They all had smiles and friendly attitudes. The rooms were very quiet - we were on the ground floor and the rooms are right next to the parking lot, but we didn't hear a thing. When we got home, we had a call from the hotel letting us know we left our car chargers in the room and are planning to mail them back tomorrow. That is great service! I would stay here again without hesitation. (And, by the way, this hotel is RIGHT across the street from the Daytona Raceway - but it is a really nice area with a mall, Barnes and Noble, resaurants and fast food places on both sides.) You need to stay here on your next trip to Daytona!!

Reviews.Title: “Florida Trip”
Reviews.Author: JimCPineMountain_NC
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay here within a week. We first located this Quality Inn in the coupon book we picked up at a rest area in Florida, on the way to our Grand daughters graduation. The price was very reasonable. Upon checking in the desk clerk was very friendly and helpful. We were given a ground floor room that was easily accessible from parking lot. The room was very clean and fresh smelling. At breakfast the next morning we were greeted by the desk staff, who were most friendly and helpful. The lady who takes care of the breakfast area, was exceptionally helpful, courteous, and friendly. (sorry I forgot her name, but will always remember her) This group was the main reason we returned to Quality Inn on our way home. We will plan to stay here on all our future trips to Florida. Would recommend to all travelers.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: NewYorkSusan56
Reviews.Content: We got delayed in Daytona due to car troubles. We stayed in the Quality Inn and had a great experience! The front desk were friendly and helpful. The woman who ran the breakfast bar always made sure it was well stocked! The hotel was very clean and updated. Would highly reccomend it!

Reviews.Title: “A long day's travel for a short night's rest”
Reviews.Author: joanna c
Reviews.Content: After traveling from GA, SC, GA, FL we were ready to stop for the night. Avid NASCAR fans, we are aware of the Daytona area. We opted to stay close to the interstate, for easy access to continue our journey. The check in staff was helpful in getting us a room quickly. Tired, we accepted the keys and ventured to room #131. Raining, we unloaded our items and acquainted ourselves with the room. No moldy/musky smell, good start. Our issues were with the bathroom. The shower curtain was drapped over the sink (outside of the bathroom). The garbage can was full of caulking pieces that the maintenance worker apparently removed from the shower/tub. New caulking was in place, thus the reason for the curtain being removed. Instead of asking to be moved to another room (again, we were tired and wanting to rest), my husband put the shower curtain back on, himself. The garbage of caulking remained when we left the room the next morning. The check out clerk did not ask if there were any concerns.

Reviews.Title: “Service and staff excellent”
Reviews.Author: Diane S
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific, great priced motel in the heart of Daytona Beach...we were in town unfortunately for a funeral and I was traveling with my 93 year old Mother. We saw the Quality Inn and stopped. The Front Desk and the Manager were unbelievably kind and so helpful. They addressed our every need and went out of their way to make us comfortable...I would stay there again, as I do have family in the area. Hooray for over and above the call of duty... Motel Owner on Hollywood Beach, Florida

Reviews.Title: “Always my choice”
Reviews.Author: Sthpw05
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here many times for motorsports events. The staff has always been helpful and always asks how I'm doing. This hotel is a great place to stay. And a perfect location.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, efficient & excellent customer service!”
Reviews.Author: Rlburch
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with this hotel. Although I normally don't stay in a motel this location fit the bill for a one nights stay and for the reasonable price. (The doors are on the outside.) I made our reservation online & requested rollaway bed and for extra towels and wash cloths. All of my requests were already in our room upon arrival! I've stayed at higher end hotels and didn't receive this great service. Rooms are updated and beds are very comfortable. Bathroom is very small but was clean. Towels were soft. Location is in the midst of all kinds of shopping and eateries.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Deal!”
Reviews.Author: eedwards
Reviews.Content: We decided to stay here at the last moment and was pleasantly surprised! The room was extremely clean with comfortable beds and nice furnishings. The front desk was very courteous at check in and went above\beyond when I had issues accessing their WI-FI. The gentleman actually came to my room within minutes of calling for help and had me up and running in no time! I have never had that level of assistance when staying in hotels, (even ones costing 2-3 times the amount). I am a Hilton member and normally stay at their establishments but would definitely come back to this hotel if staying in the area. Pro's: - comfortable beds - flat screen television - microwave\refrigerator - modern furnishings - price - excellent staff Con's: - brand of in room coffee wasn't the greatest

Reviews.Title: “Better than before.”
Reviews.Author: motomuse
Reviews.Content: This hotel was refurbished a few years ago. It is clean, comfortable, & affordable. Very nice breakfast buffet with either waffles or pancakes. Rooms at the back end are quieter due to being on a busy street.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay and Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Mike P
Reviews.Content: Thank you for taking care of my family and I during our stay with you last week. We will definitley recommend this hotel to our friends!

Reviews.Title: “Great room”
Reviews.Author: CCS55
Reviews.Content: we used this hotel as a stopover on our trip to Fort Lauderdale. It was a very nice room, very clean and reasonably priced. The only reaon I didn't rate it excellent was because of the breakfast. The selection was not nearly as good as other hotels we have stayed at and there is very limited seating, without going upstairs. All-in-all I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: genealogygerri
Reviews.Content: This was about my fourth or fifth stay in the last three years. I will not stay anywhere else while IN Daytona. I live in Jacksonville, Fl and I commute 1.5 hours each way to my job in Daytona each day, which I have been doing for the past 3.5 years. I have stayed at another hotel and my experience was awful. I have never had any complaints. This stay the staff was extra caring as I left my wallet with my id's and credit cards in it at home. I called the manager and the desk clerk on when I check in remember me. The manager I believe her name was Debra came out and introduced herself to me. I wish I could remember the night time clerks name. When checking out this morning Amanda remember me from a last time. It was nice also to get a breakfast to take with me to work. I HIGHLY Praise the staff, the hotel cleanness adn amendities that come with the room. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Daytona International Speedway hotel winner”
Reviews.Author: Yamahayzfr1
Reviews.Content: Superb guest service from everyone, including the General Manager. Prompt, professional, and friendly. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: AlB854
Reviews.Content: Just a one night stopover while on the road. Was a good stay, from the friendly staff in the lobby to the very clean and pleasant room, and the free breakfast. Proximity to speedway allowed us time for a tour. Would highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Daytona stay 2012”
Reviews.Author: Richard C
Reviews.Content: Very clean and helpful. Hope to return for 500/2013

Reviews.Title: “thankful for a very clean hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Doreen H
Reviews.Content: After lodging a complaint last night in Columbia South Carolina I am so happy to find such a wonderful clean hotel in Daytona Beach! Another bonus is the young man at the desk named Will who was so happy to hear that news! The room is very clean and quiet and comfortable firm clean beds! After travelling all day this room is exactly what we needed! Thanks choice hotels for recommending this spot and thanks Will for making us feel so comfortable and vauled! Doreen & Wayne

Reviews.Title: “Speed weeks 2012”
Reviews.Author: amorrison29
Reviews.Content: Amanda and everyone at the hotel was great. Nice and very clean hotel. Would stay again and again.

Reviews.Title: “daytona 500 stay”
Reviews.Author: tipper2012
Reviews.Content: very clean, good staff,great local. Did not like the way parking was allowed to be too crowded on race day.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Matt C
Reviews.Content: Great stay for bike week. Close enough to hit Main St and all the surronding events, yet far just far enough away to avoid traffic congestion. Quiets down just after midnight to get a good rest for the next day. As far as the hotel, I was never in want of anything.

Reviews.Title: “amanda is awsome”
Reviews.Author: denshi
Reviews.Content: right across from speedway entrance . really helpful during rain delays . clean peaceful excellent staff . amanda really is great !

Reviews.Title: “Bang for Buck”
Reviews.Author: Matt G
Reviews.Content: I frequent central Florida as a regional rep for my company. The staff is incredibly helpful here and the rooms well kept. I was told it was built 4 years ago but it still looks brand new! This place is perfect for those who value cleanliness and comfort. They will have my business for as long as I travel here.

Reviews.Title: “great spot”
Reviews.Author: Canadianguy5252
Reviews.Content: Great location close to everything, couple we were with had stayed there before and it was as great as they had said.Very friendly staff, reasonable price, clean and well looked after we would not hesitate to stay again

Reviews.Title: “Race Week Vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Steve_Sheila_12
Reviews.Content: We come here every year during Dayonta race week. It's across the street from the track and several restaurants are nearby, so we can walk to everything we do. The best part is we can walk to our seats at the track in less than 15 minutes. The rooms are spacious and very clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful too! The "customer appreciation bar-b-que" they have on Friday is awesome!! Thanks for another memorable vacation. We wouldn't stay anywhere else...See ya next year!

Reviews.Title: “DAYTONA 500 TRIP”
Reviews.Author: djohnson51
Reviews.Content: Great hotel,people were great, the location is awesome. You can walk to the track, which was great since it rained. The staff is great. The rooms nice and clean. Couldn't find a better place too stay. Been there since 1990 and wouldn't stay anywhere else. Looking forward to next year already.

Reviews.Title: “SPEED WEEKS 2012”
Reviews.Author: Ashley S
Reviews.Content: The hotel is directly across from the speedway which is nice. Close proximity to Daytona Beach . Centered around many eating establishments. Hotel staff was friendly and helpful. The owner was available anytime.

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location!”
Reviews.Author: GDJ14
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located directly across from the Daytona International Speedway. I love staying here as I do not have to drive during Sppedweeks. I just park my car when I get there and I can walk to everything. There is plenty of shopping and places to eat. And the best thing is I can walk to my seat at the speedway in less than 15 minutes. The hotel is quiet and I always get a good night's sleep. All of the staff are very friendly, especially Amanda and Fiona at the front desk.

Reviews.Title: “Daytona 500 (Monday race day)”
Reviews.Author: WMN6724
Reviews.Content: Great hotel!! Awesome location! We were able to book a room for Monday night, by fortunate timing, someone had just cancelled. This hotel was awesome! The rooms are clean with all the expected amenities. The staff is very friendly, first class. But more importantly, it is all about LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION! From the hotel, Keech was directly across the road, which were where our seats were located. This was so great since the race lasted well after midnight. All we had to do was walk across the road. Important note: I learned from some of the guests that most guests book there rooms for the Speed Week thru Daytona 500 for 2013 when they check out. We were just lucky to have the opportunity to book a room because Sunday's race was rained out and the race was run on Monday.

Reviews.Title: “Daytona 500 Trip”
Reviews.Author: Walter S
Reviews.Content: We had stayed at another hotel but booked the Quality Inn Daytona Speedway for Monday night following the Sunday rainout. We were extremely pleased by the way the staff greated us and the attention they payed to us to make our single night stay a pleasant experience. Amanda was extremely helpful during the process. The room was clean and very well equipped and shall we say, location, location, location. We placed our name on the wait list for the 2013 race. Walt S.

Reviews.Title: “Great Race Week”
Reviews.Author: pahiii
Reviews.Content: This was my third race week at Quality Inn. The property is close to the track, modern, convenient to restaurants and provides wonderful service by a friendly staff. I'll definitely stay here any time I'm in Daytona, including Race Week 2013.

Reviews.Title: “Daytona 500 Trip”
Reviews.Author: Ray C
Reviews.Content: Owners on the property making sure everything is first class . Convenient to the track. You can walk to the track. 20+ year guest.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel with easy access to speedway”
Reviews.Author: Ronald Y
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel for anyone with business near the track. I stayed during the Daytona 500 and the service was good given the fact the hotel was full. They made you feel like a valued customer and were very helpful with directions and good restaurants in the area. The only drawback to this motel during Raceweek is that they require a 5 night minumum stay. I will definitely consider this motel again if in the area for the race or pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Sam H H
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel for the past two race seasons. It is convient to the track and very clean and comfortable. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Daytona area.

Reviews.Title: “Review for February 2012 Stay for Daytona Speedweeks”
Reviews.Author: Janice C
Reviews.Content: We keep coming back due to the great service, warm and welcoming staff, including all cleaning gals. Owner/Manager is at the location and providing assistance as necessary - he also remembers us every year we come back!! He is very attentive to our needs and of course, we would expect nothing less in light of the fees that we are charged for the race week events. We do not hesitate to make our arrangements for next year as we always look forward to our stay at the Daytona Quality Inn. Keep up the great attitudes and service - Until we see you again next year!!

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay”
Reviews.Author: HERBIETWO
Reviews.Content: Well,we're actually waiting for the rain to stop so they can get the Daytona 500 run today (Monday). Fortunately we're staying at the Quality Inn Daytona Speedway again so that's making the delay a lot easier to take. The room is clean and very well equipped and the staff is top shelf. They are always going the extra mile to please their guests.

Reviews.Title: “Daytona 500 Trip”
Reviews.Author: Dale R
Reviews.Content: Another outstanding stay at the Quality Inn in Daytona. This was my fourth stay... the staff again has been very kind and helpful. Great customer service and clean rooms. I enjoyed the free breakfest. The location was very convenient for all the racing events.

Reviews.Title: “My Visit to the Daytona Beach Quality Inn”
Reviews.Author: Sharon B
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Quality Inn was enjoyable. The rooms are quite clean and the room service is top notch. The hotel management is quite personal and caring with attention to all of our needs. We ran out of coffee and the hotel manager personally delivered coffee, cups and sugar. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent - watch the fees.”
Reviews.Author: letsplaygolf
Reviews.Content: The inn is very new, check in was easy, the room was very nice, the breakfast fantastic. The room did need a few mnor repairs. Watch for the $1.50 fee IF you use the fridge/micro that is automatically added to the bill.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel with quality service”
Reviews.Author: Gehyder
Reviews.Content: This is first class run hotel. The owner shows his appreciation for his guests at all cost. The rooms are nice and room service is great. All in all, the staff at the hotel was very good. I would highly recommend this place. Rupesh, the owner, is personable and provides hands on service.

Reviews.Title: “hotel and staff”
Reviews.Author: paul k
Reviews.Content: Our room was exceptionally clean and very well equipped with amenities. I don't remember the price but it was a great value. It was almost directly across daytona speedway but since it was off-season the room was very reasonable. Breakfast was delicious, fresh and our attendant (Susan) was friendly and hospitable as was the rest of the staff. Look forward to going back if in the area again

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: JoD80
Reviews.Content: Stayed overnight on the way to a cruise departing Ft. Lauderdale, and loved the motel. Super nice people who obviously want to please the traveler. You have to look really hard to notice this property has been remodeled, and looks nearly new. The location is across the street from the speedway, and it is close to everything. Had a super continental breakfast buffet, and the lady running it was very nice and attentive. We will stay here again, for sure!!

Reviews.Title: “Race weekend with Friends”
Reviews.Author: John P
Reviews.Content: This is our fourth weekend stay. My friends (college buddies from the sixties) and I have gotten together for years for the Rolex 24 hour race. Four years ago week discovered this Inn. Location is great, we walk to the track, the rooms are clean, the grounds are aways neat. Best part is the staff, Front desk and check in was done in a friendly and professional manner by Amanda. The free breakfast is taken care of by Susan and Lynn, both treat you like a king. Their friendly amd welcoming style make you fell at home. The housekeeping staff is just as good. This is the place to stay in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “another great rolex weekend”
Reviews.Author: nsprouse
Reviews.Content: for the fifth year in a row, the staff of daytona speedway quality inn did a superb job of taking care of me during the rolex 24 hour race.... great location, great breakfast, great staff... many thanks... looking forward to doing it again next year....

Reviews.Title: “Overnight stay at the Quality Inn”
Reviews.Author: Mario P
Reviews.Content: Is our second time staying here,everything was excellent.The staff,service,facilities was superb.We arrived a little bit early,they were so nice to let us register early,very profesional!The breakfast was good!The rooms were clean and organized.Next trip to Daytona we will definitely stay here again.I will tell all of my friends about the wonderful and profesional service at the Quality Inn at Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable”
Reviews.Author: nancy b
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at this motel, since it was the Travelodge. We stay there for 2012 Daytona Fan Fest, and we couldnt believe the changes in this motel. It was very clean and everything you needed. Amanda at the front desk, was very courteous and very helpful. The price was reasonably, as i booked it online. I would stay there again, but not for the two races, they have in Feb. and July, way to expensive. I would suggest, lowering the prices, for those races, so more people could afford and enjoy this motel. Thank You, Billy and Nancy Binns. Winter Haven, FL,

Reviews.Title: “Very happy with our stay.”
Reviews.Author: Penny P
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with this hotel. Easy access, room was clean. We stayed Monday thru Friday and we would stay here again. Rate was very reasonable for the value of the hotel. We had a truck and trailer so the only reason I did not give this a 5 rating was because of the limited parking area.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Lake Placid, New York, United States
Reviews.Title: “Very Nice”
Reviews.Author: Jason P
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here during the Daytona 500. After staying in many hotels for many years going to the race, This place by far is the cleanest most comfortable place that I have stayed. Very friendly staff. The morning breakfast is great. Directly across the street from the track.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Experience”
Reviews.Author: Will S
Reviews.Content: I stayed here one night as I was in town for work. Overall, I was very happy with my selection. As it was the tourist off-season and there were no racing events taking place at the track, my total costs were only about $65 with tax. The beds are very comfortable and the rooms very clean and nice. The treadmill in the fitness center was old but workable. Breakfast was decent. Overall, the hotel exceeded my expectations. The only negative was they wouldn't give me a late check out even though it would have been very appreciated and convenient given my particular circumstances. It's conveniently located right next to the airport, but the minimum cab ride is $12 no matter how short a distance you are traveling. I very much appreciated the free wi-fi.

Reviews.Title: “A 2nd home”
Reviews.Author: Cally571
Reviews.Content: Being the regular place that I stay in Daytona for business it is welcoming to see my friend Amanda at the front desk who is always wonderful and takes such good care to make sure my needs are met. The beds are clean and very comfy for a very good nights sleep. On arriving I know I can completely relax as everything is ready for me after a long drive.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Nancy F
Reviews.Content: We were impressed with our stay here, very nice, clean, the room was great, the bathroom felt like we were home, the beds were very comfortable. The lobby and breakfast area was bright and decorated nicely. We were pleasantly surprised at the variety of foods in the free breakfast and everything was delicious. The location was perfect as it is close to the highway and directly across the street from the speedway, we were able to watch all the hot rods drive by right outside our room, but once the door closed, we could sleep in peace and quiet. This was our first stay here, will definitely come back.Thanks. Jesus & Nancy Flores

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for DIS”
Reviews.Author: Jim G
Reviews.Content: This was my 5th stay at this motel. They are always very friendly and helpful. Breakfast is always great and free. Rooms are comfortable and excellent wifi connections. Amanda at the front desk was espicially nice and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Race Track Certified”
Reviews.Author: BCphoto21
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay for anyone around the Daytona International Speedway or just passing through. Friendly staff that will take care of you without question, close to plenty of good places to eat, shop and entertain. Rooms are very clean and quiet for being right on the Main street. Will surely be staying there anytime I am up in the Daytona Speedway area.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient to DIS..”
Reviews.Author: Sthpw05
Reviews.Content: Great place and great staff. Friendly and always helpful. Stayed there twice in the past month for DIS events and the location is incredible. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: Laurie R
Reviews.Content: I was in town for the Daytona Speedway, and this hotel with its location is perfect. It is right across the street from the speedway, and there are plenty places for eating, shopping, and entertainment right in the immediate vicinity. The room was very clean and quiet, and the customer service was terrific for check-in and the complimentary breakfast. Thanks so much for a great stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Lot of pleasant surprises”
Reviews.Author: Bobbert63
Reviews.Content: On our way to Fort Myers from Canada, we decided to stay in Daytona Beach (right on the beach front) as neither of us had ever been there before. Not exactly what we were expecting...think college spring break but temporarily abandoned. We just couldn't stay in this area, so we headed back out to the Interstate hotel area. Turned out to be a good idea. The Quality Inn across the street from the Daytona Speedway is a fairly new, very nice hotel. The lobby immediately welcomes you. It is very boutique or designer for lack of a better word. The first of many pleasant surprises. While the rooms were very comfortable and the area safe and surrounded by lots of good restaurants, the two most pleasant surprises were two of your staff members. Amanda, the first person we talked with at check in, was so involved in the hotel. Her pride in this facility really came shining through just chatting with her. We automatically knew this was where we would be staying. She helped us with so many things effortlessly. Lynn we met the following morning. She is in charge of the buffet breakfast area. She is such a warm person and she keeps this area immaculately clean. Once again, her pride of this hotel really came shining through. It was almost like staying with family. All I can think to say is how fortunate this property is to have such high quality people working there, You just don't find staff that truly gives off the air that they are happy to be doing their job anymore. It was a really great stay on a long drive. THANK YOU!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Ericka M
Reviews.Content: Your hotel was very inviting from the cleanliness of the room to your hotel staff, but what stood out the most was my experience at the front desk upon checking in, where I met Angela who was very informative and made me feel at home with a pleasant attitude and a great smile. If she continues to treat your customers the way she treated me, then your establishment's clientele will grow rapidly. Whenever I am in town I definitely will stay at your hotel and look forward to that great smile.

Reviews.Title: “"Very happy customer"”
Reviews.Author: Msvtan64
Reviews.Content: Well my family and I had a very good experience at the hotel, the breakfast was great...the service was impeccable. And there was one person that stuck in my mind a front desk clerk name Angela she was very helpful with directions and getting us checked in very quickly she is a great asset to your company. House keeping was also wonderful i will recommend this hotel to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: Matt T
Reviews.Content: We stayed there this weekend as we were racing @ the speedway across the street. Great little hotel. Everything was clean and looked recently refurbished. The staff was very nice and helpful throughout the stay. Tons of close restaurants within walking distance and the continental breakfast in the morning will start your day off right! We are heading back to the track in 2 weeks and have already booked to stay here again. Wouldn't stay anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: M A M
Reviews.Content: I spent 3 nights at this very well appointed hotel. It was very nicely decorated, it was clean and comfortable. It is very handy to the Speedway. Breakfast was very tasty. The desk staff were polite and helpful, especially Angela, whose directions were impeccable!

Reviews.Title: “good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: SmokinJoe T
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel. Accomodations were very nice, clean, comfortable. Very close to Daytona Speedway and nearby attractions. Sandy was very helpful during checkin allowing me to check in 1 hr early. I would recommend this hotel if you are staying in Daytona, FLA. Rate a little high on the weekend but worth it.

Reviews.Title: “three is a charm!”
Reviews.Author: Denise S
Reviews.Content: this was my third stay at Quality Inn, Daytona Beach,ISB. Always clean,so very convenient and accessible to the surrounding community. The staff, Will,Amanda & Angela are such an asset to your organization and i am so please to be able to enjoy and patronize a business in the community inwhich i reside. My thanks to you all as well as the wonderful lady who assists with breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Second visit, hotel continues to improve”
Reviews.Author: travelmor
Reviews.Content: I visited this hotel several months ago and was impressed with the lobby, rooms and service. This visit was as good or better than the first. The hotel is great, rooms are large and have all the items needed for a good stay - great beds, good internet service, microwave, refrigerator, hairdryer, coffee maker, and a good breakfast. But I feel what makes this hotel more special than most are the people, they have a new General Manager, Deborah Bailey who is warm and friendly, the front desk staff that I met, Wil, Amanda and Angela were delightful. They were always visible, smiling and ready to help. The hotel is directly across from the Daytona International Speedway, I think you will like this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Staff, great facilites!”
Reviews.Author: harrynmione
Reviews.Content: This place is the best value for your money. The staff is super friendly and informative. The rooms are really clean. My only minor concern is the TV's in the room - they have tube TV's with reception not being too good, but again that's minor. Upon arrival, Angela, the clerk manning the office at night was very friendly and extremely informative. Also, Amanda, the clerk at the front desk was super nice and insisted that I have some breakfast before I go. Staff was top notch all around! I would definitely stay here again when in the Daytona area. Also, the location is prime if you're there for the Daytona 500 as it is literally across the street from the track!

Reviews.Title: “"Great service and breakfast"”
Reviews.Author: vsoda
Reviews.Content: We booked the Quality Inn Daytona Speedway because of the location right across the street from the Speedway. We were attending a wedding reception at the Speedway and the location was very convenient. We checked in with Angela, and she couldn't have been sweeter or more helpful. The room was very comfortable, clean, and with a very comfortable bed. And the free breakfast the next morning was amazing. There were delicious waffles, homemade sausage and biscuits, fruit, pastries, cereal, sliced hard boiled eggs, toast, granola bars, yogurt, coffee, juices. water. It was an unbelievable value. And the woman that was working in there when we were eating, was cleaning everything up and so friendly. It was a great stay. I would absolutely recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Service”
Reviews.Author: Michel T
Reviews.Content: Reasonsable prices, a wonderful breakfast, and very comfortable rooms is all apart of the service I continue to experience at Quality Inn Datona. My National Guard weekends can be grueling. Staying here is a home away from home and the friendly staff provide comfort and smiles needed to bring momentary peace.

Reviews.Title: “The best kept secret”
Reviews.Author: michael p
Reviews.Content: I came to daytona florida looking for a nice and reasonable hotel. I checked a few of them but wasn't satisfied. I drove to international speedway blvd, right across from the daytona racetrack. I paid for a room at the quality inn on international speedway blvd. The hotel was Quality Inn. The price was very reasonable. The hotel room looked like it was brand new. the beds were perfect. The linen was second to none. They had everything that i would have in my own bath room. They had microwave, an iron and board, small refrigerator. One more thing, the air condition was good. Believe me i will stay there again if I'm at daytona florida. It was satisfying for me and my wife. I want to thank The lovely lady at the desk for assisting me in staying at the Quality Inn. My name is Michael P. Thank you Angela Thankyou Angela

Reviews.Title: “MORE COMFORTABLE THAN HOME”
Reviews.Author: Karen M
Reviews.Content: the hotel is beautiful and the most comfortable bed EVER!!! Everyone treated us wonderful it was like family. It is the only place we will stay from now on. CHECK THEM OUT!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “small,but okay”
Reviews.Author: steve a
Reviews.Content: the room was clean,but would be very small for more than 2 people,also the t.v had terrible reception,it may be time to update them.Angela at the front desk was very friendly and helpful,she is an asset to the company.

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly a nice place”
Reviews.Author: ernC_11
Reviews.Content: This is the first time that Ive added anything on trip advisor. Staff were great breakfast good value and a good location. We traveled arround the USA for 6 weeks (we are from Australia) and this Quality inn was one of the nicest. All good and opposite the speedway. it was easy to find and not far from town by car..ern

Reviews.Title: “Thank You Angela”
Reviews.Author: N R
Reviews.Content: I spoke with Angela on the phone regarding our reservations for Paul Russell Road Church of Christ, where we reserved 9 rooms on 9/17/2011. She was very professional and pleasant. It was very nice to put a face with a person who had everything in order and ready for our group upon arrival. Thank you Angela. In addition to excellent services, the hotel was located very conventiently to malls, dining and beach. I look forward to a return stay. Reed Room 240

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: lbelle2000
Reviews.Content: Even though we arrived real late at night Agent at check in was extremly upbeat and happy welcomed us with a big smile. Housekeeping staff was great room was clean and very comfortable. Hotel Overall all thumbs up. Whenever im in Daytona this is the hotel i will be staying at..

Reviews.Title: “We will definitely be back”
Reviews.Author: mrwhite2010
Reviews.Content: Quality Inn and its related properties are our hotels of choice. They are consistently clean and the service is always good. The continental breakfast is excellent as well. A special thank you to Amanda at the front desk who helped us out on arrival because we had some issues making our reservation through the toll free number. She straightened everything out, was very pleasant, and made our check in process very easy.

Reviews.Title: “Right across the street from speedway with beautiful rooms”
Reviews.Author: tommig1506
Reviews.Content: Excellent service... provided us with a late check out when we woke up late because of our alarm not working. Room was spotless. Hidden mini fridge n microwave. Pillowtop mattress and curtains that blocked the brightest sun! Awesome!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome rooms and Waffles!”
Reviews.Author: jhoward43
Reviews.Content: The rooms are awesome. Greatly decorated. Complimentary breakfast was delicious. There was a wafffle maker that makes the yummiest waffles.

Reviews.Title: “Great place and we will be back; AB from Florida”
Reviews.Author: barbran44
Reviews.Content: Clean, nice size room, short walk to the race track, Really GREAT owner, staff, and all the help. If you want something they are right there to help. YES we would and are going to stay here again, and again, and again. Could use additional ice machines during events. but it is only a short walk to a store.

Reviews.Title: “Told one thing by the Front Desk, not honored by General Manager. Get it in writing!”
Reviews.Author: CMJ091
Reviews.Content: My family was scheduled to stay at this hotel in late June, 2011. When my wife saw that this was an "old fashioned" hotel without interior hallways (i.e. the doors to the rooms open to the outside of the hotel) she was concerned about safety. The area immediately around the hotel is "transitional". We were told by the night manager that is was OK to check out other hotels in the area and that if we still didn't want to stay there she would work with us to cancel our reservation, just to call back and let her know. We found another hotel, booked it, and moved in. When we called the night manager back, she said that Christina her general manager had over-ruled her and we would still be charged for that night, even though we never stepped foot in a room. Traveler beware!

Reviews.Title: “absolutely a 5 star *****”
Reviews.Author: dumbdore
Reviews.Content: The rooms were spic and span clean, the staff was amazing, we have never met such a staff that was so attentive to your needs, they are truly wonderful. Our experience was wonderful from the minute we walked thru the door to the minute we left. The staff recommended places to see while we were there and they even printed us directions and reviews to places where we were heading. ***** (five stars)all the way. Shelby is awesome:) Bucalas New windsor, ny

Reviews.Title: “Sweet Dreams Come True”
Reviews.Author: griffithgang
Reviews.Content: Our family was taking a vacation this April and we could not get in to our reserved hotel room until the following day. We arrived at around 3:00 am and the only hotel with rooms was the Quality Inn. The gave us a great rate and the staff was so friendly. I have since liked them on facebook as well. We will surely stay there again. What made it a "Sweet Dream Come True" is that with it being dark we didn't know where we exactly was until day break. The next morning I looked outside and we was looking at turn one of the Daytona Speedway. I am a huge race fan and have always wanted to see the speedway. This was just an added sweet dream for me to see in the morning.

Reviews.Title: “Always a great stay”
Reviews.Author: neptunenavigator
Reviews.Content: I frequently stay at this hotel for business travel in the Daytona area within thirty miles of my destination. The front desk staff is always curteous and welcoming. It is an older location that was completly remodeled and looks, and feels better than most other hotels in my territory. The showers are clean and surrounded in solid surface material which is very clean. The beds are top notch, soft, and with very good linens. They king rooms have nice desks for working as well. I appreciated the fridge/micro combinations. I have not had a bad stay in my three years visiting this hotel, which is usually five days per month.

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: frodriguez06
Reviews.Content: Our trip was for a weekend getaway and to go to the Richard Petty Driving Experience. In addition to it being conveniently across the street to the Daytona International Speedway, the hotel appears to have been recently renovated. The room exceeded my expectations as it was modern and super spacious. The lobby was also very welcoming with its friendly staff and updated breakfast area. I couldn't have asked for a better experience. It was an excellent value for my money, considering I also got a great deal using a coupon code I found on TripAdvisor.com!

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: Travelfamily68
Reviews.Content: Our childrens travel hockey team stayed at this hotel at first driving up and seeing this was a true motel I was iffy, but was surprised at how nice everything was. I was told the hotel was revamped 2008, Lobby was beautiful and rooms were small but nice clean comfortable. It was missing a pool kids wanted to swim but we were five minute drive to beach. The rooms were remodeled nicely. Breakfast was decent but best of all was the service everyone that worked at this hotel was wonderful from steve who helped with all our reservations to front desk and so on. What a great group of people working for this hotel. We stay at many hotels and this staff was top notch. Many restaurants and shopping close by.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Omonyja
Reviews.Content: Good location, decent value, nice clean rooms, good staff... Not a five star hotel, but definitely very decent with helpful staff. No complaints here.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful and very clean!”
Reviews.Author: Sarahhoy
Reviews.Content: We came in at 3 am and someone was there immediately to check us in. Very, very clean! Staff was very friendly and prompt.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL AND STAFF”
Reviews.Author: HOTSHOT57
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at this hotel along with another couple and were very pleased with all the accomodations. Great location for race fans and beach bums alike.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Majong
Reviews.Content: We were returning from a day at St. Augustine's Golf Hall of Fame. Saw this hotel so we decided to stop in. Wadera was the gentleman that checked us in. Very friendly. He gave us the rate that was published in the Room Saver book. Hotel had been renovated 1 1/2 years ago but we thought it had just been finished. Very comfortable bed. Just had coffee in the morning before we left but the continental breakfast looked good. Good location to many restaurants and the Daytona Speedway was just across the street. Would stay here again, and would recommend this hotel to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful hotel - service outstanding”
Reviews.Author: sangermma
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed this hotel. Price was great; room and breakfast excellent; Location outstanding (lots of restaurants/ services nearby). Bed very comfortable - had a wonderful night's sleep!!

Reviews.Title: “Overall this was a great stay, highly recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: specialtymotorcars
Reviews.Content: Room was clean. Bed and pillows were very comfortable. Maid service everyday. Breakfast was free and had a lot of choices including fruit. it was one of the first times I was able to fall asleep the first night in a hotel room. It was refreshingly quiet!!!

Reviews.Title: “The Reviews are spot on!!!”
Reviews.Author: CalGal888
Reviews.Content: A big thank you to Steven for helping with the accounting issue that had come up. I couldn't have made it home without your help!!!! My daughter had a cheer competition at the Beach Bandshell that was about a ten minute ride from the hotel. So glad we weren't in the mess of staying at a hotel by the water. Traffic was horrible over there, and most charged for parking and the internet. Not the Quality Inn.... Free internet, parking, and a little breakfast to get you going were included in the room charge. The Quality Inn is located directly across from the Speedway and is in the middle of International Blvd that has it all. I gave the room a 4 as I have a sensitive nose, and there was an odor in the air. My daughter wasn't bothered by it at all. I thought for sure we were given a smoking room, but when another room was being clearned I asked for a sniff. We got a non smoking room - for sure! For those with a sensitive nose like msyself, bring a candle or some glade.

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: LKOTT
Reviews.Content: It was a great place to be located since it was right across from the speedway. There was a lot of food places to walk too and the beach was about 5 miles away. We had great service the whole week we were there except one day when a lady got snippy with us. Other than that it was great!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfully Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Deborah0711
Reviews.Content: This was a spur of the moment stop for us, and I was surprised. THe decor was clean and pleasing. This was close to everything. Even though it's a very busy area, we didin't have far to go to be ab;e to enjoy ourselves. I will definitely be going back.

Reviews.Title: “Older motel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: MrsMarx
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel because the reviews were great, and it was a nice enough place. But the room was quite small by today's standards, and with very large,dark furniture it seemed even smaller. We actually bought 100 watt light bulbs to brightened the place up, and provide enought light to read. We requested, and received, a first floor room, but it was next to the ice machine. The staff was pleasant, and breakfast was average.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable comfort in a great location”
Reviews.Author: thedjsgirl4208
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights after Christmas. It was very inexpensive and the rooms were very clean and the beds and linens were nice. The front desk attendant was very courteous and helpful. Will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “best hotel at track”
Reviews.Author: denshi
Reviews.Content: friendly clean and right across from speedway in the heart of shopping food and entertainment

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: staceyguerra
Reviews.Content: We stay at this Quality Inn every year when we attend the Daytona 500. Whether you go for an event or just to enjoy Daytona Beach, this Quality Inn is conveniently located, very clean, and a great value for the price. The staff is very courteous and professional. I'd recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great atmosphere and place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Kandice28
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful hotel and you can not beat the great location. You are right across from the speedway and walking distance to everything you need. We love this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Service!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Heather60269
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed there for our honeymoon in February. It was wonderful, the service is great, the rep at the front desk was so kind and he gave us some great options of the best food places or the best places to go. Rooms were very clean and loved the stay! would definitly stay there again! Loved how it was right across from the Daytona Speedway!

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: amorrison29
Reviews.Content: Had a wonderfull stay the staff was great and the hotel is very clean

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for Daytona Races.”
Reviews.Author: emslie1903
Reviews.Content: Easy walk to Daytona track. Close to resturants. Easy to get in and out of after races. Shopping near by.

Reviews.Title: “Park and Enjoy Daytona”
Reviews.Author: DunbarPaChevy
Reviews.Content: I have stayed the last 30 years at this hotel to enjoy the races. I park and walk to the races. Come back and can enjoy a clean room, clean up, and sit on the balcony and watch the trafic leaving the race. The service is great and always willing to help you. The breakfast is a nice added benefit.

Reviews.Title: “By far best place to stay for race week”
Reviews.Author: dtbird
Reviews.Content: Great location right across from the speedway.Walkinf distance to track & restaurants Free parking all week. Nice people, not to noisy except when race cars are practicing which we like to hear. Highly recommended for race fans

Reviews.Title: “Best Value across from the track!”
Reviews.Author: bsvickery
Reviews.Content: Rooms are clean. Friendliest staff in Daytona Beach. Lots of restaurants within walking distance. Walked across the street to see the race. Highly recommend this place to anyone interested in a no hassle trip to the Daytona 500.

Reviews.Title: “very nice accomadations and pleasant staff”
Reviews.Author: HERBIETWO
Reviews.Content: we stayed for the Daytona races and we were pleased with the overall experience.The staff is very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for a great price.”
Reviews.Author: Marta34438
Reviews.Content: My family and I had to travel to Ormond Beach recently for my mother-in-law's funeral. We stayed at this hotel based on my brother-in-law's suggestion. He always stays here for racing events and highly recommended it. We were so pleasantly surprised that we would definitely recommend it and return. The beds were very comfortable. Before we left for the services in the morning my daughter needed a lint brush. We hadn't packed one and didn't have much time. We tried the office just in case they had one, they didn't but didn't waste any time in helping us make a temporary one out of scotch tape. They were very kind and were willing to help in any way they could. Highly recommend the place.

Reviews.Title: “QUALITY INN EXCEEDED ALL MY EXPECTATIONS!”
Reviews.Author: PrettyLayLay
Reviews.Content: I was so amazed at the outstanding customer service, cleanliness of the room, and overall comfort. Normally I am disgusted with most other hotels due to the odors, bugs, broken items, and mold. I am so very glad I chose this Quality Inn in Daytona Beach. The price was very reasonable and affordable. Everything in the room looked fairly new and up to date, nothing was broken and most importantly...CLEAN! I have very sensitive allergies so I'm the type of person that never looks forward to staying at a hotel due to those critical issues mentioned above. I will recommend this location to anyone! Quality Inn puts many other hotels to shame. My stay was outstanding...I had no complaints. I will definitely return again soon.

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST HOTEL ALL THE WAY AROUND YOU COULD STAY AT... Dont think it could have been any better”
Reviews.Author: lilracer9
Reviews.Content: Everything about the hotel is GREAT! Very happy with it. The customer service is outstanding, very affordable rates, the cleanliness is great, the beds are SOOO COMFORTABLE with LOTS of COMFY pillows, great cont. breakfest... ALL AROUND A GREAT HOTEL!! Have stayed there before & WILL continue to stay there when in that area.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Paula1133
Reviews.Content: 2/3/11 Good morning all our friends at the Daytona Beach Quality Inn. I was among the large group of people from Continental Tire that stayed at your hotel January 24th – January 31st, 2011, wanted to take the time to thank you for everything. Wow! What a weekend! Wanted to let you guys know what a great job you did on the 24hour hotel stay accommodations. I have no doubt, you've had lots of experience planning of these events, but it was more than I had imagined. The attention to detail was evidenced by the smoothness of the whole operation. Your wonderful staff helped to make everything go perfect for us. Our crew of fifty people arrive on Friday the 28th and we had them (with your staffs help), checked into the hotel, supplies in hand and off to their rooms in right around a half hour or so. (I’ve had longer check in times when I’ve been traveling alone). We then provided a meal for our crew Friday night, once again every one of the staff members went beyond the call of duty to make sure things rolled perfect for us. And they did. Also, I don’t know if you have a connection with the weather people, but the weather was perfect!!! Great, great, great! Definitely hope to stay with you again. Thanks again for everything. Sincerely, Paula Nate Public Relations Hoosier Racing Tire

Reviews.Title: “Went above and beyond to accommodate for our company's stay”
Reviews.Author: admccart
Reviews.Content: The service that our company obtained this last weekend was far above and beyond the service I was expecting from a small hotel. They made me feel like a royal guest and were happy to assist me with any problems or questions that I had. I highly recommend the stay at Quality Inn – Daytona Beach. I look forward to staying with them again. The rooms were very clean and the beds slept great! I’m a highly impressed customer.

Reviews.Title: “Quality Inn Daytona Beach unetheical business practices”
Reviews.Author: SteveB86
Reviews.Content: Motel Staff lied about applying travel points, by accepting Chice Privledge card, and then refusing points due to rate. No mention made at check in or check out. Motel added an additional $1.50 surcharge to bill. when asked about it, desk staff said that was a charge to help pay for "Free Wi-Fi and continental breakfast". Yet both amenities are listed as Free on web site. when asked to remove that charge, clerk said only the manager could do that, and she was out of town at a meeting. What a lame excuse!!!! This property is unetheical and a total rip off

Reviews.Title: “Not good”
Reviews.Author: needmorevacationdayz
Reviews.Content: We stayed here to attend a conference nearby. I don't consider myself picky, but the bed skirt on the queen-size bed had a 20" rip in it. Pretty shabby. I saw a small roach roaming around and smashed it. (Usually means there's a mommy roach somewhere, or other roaches.) There was only one bar of soap. There were notes in the room about how if we needed anything we could let mgmt. know, but we were too tired to complain and only stayed one night. I guess you get what you pay for -- this hotel was inexpensive compared to others. Staff was nice.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Stay during Holidays”
Reviews.Author: dvdAlong
Reviews.Content: I wanted to first say the staff is wonderful. They went above and beyond what we expected. We went to Daytona Beach for Thanksgiving to attend the TurkeyRod Car show and stayed at this Quality Inn across from the speedway. Our room on the 2nd floor was nice and quiet. The room looked pretty much brand new..they must have renovated recently. In the morning we went down for breakfast and was warmly greeted by lady serving breakfast. I had a waffle and my husband had english muffin and sausage. Great Breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed Here Once Before and Came Back... Guess What...Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: frequent47
Reviews.Content: I stayed here before and came back and Guess what .... The Hotel only got Better, if possible! I was surprise to see the same staff.. I felt I was a welcome relative... comfortable beds, very clean, internet got better, rooms still had that new look. Never saw so much cleaning... notice a woman in the lobby scrubing the stairs on her hands and knees....very comfortable, safe, friendly hotel... I'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant surprise!”
Reviews.Author: SimoneVa
Reviews.Content: Horrible weather during my stay-it rained the entire time-I was pleasantly surprised when we saw our rooms! Very clean bathroom-fluffy towels-the bed was as advertised! Front desk very friendly-cleaning staff very helpful!Breakfast ended too soon for my liking-0600-0900.There was a charge to use the computer for online access in the lobby but wireless offered in rooms-The location is directly across from the racetrack-I'm sure they are booked during raceweek! The microwave and fridge in my room was an extra added plus. I will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Ripped off by housekeeping”
Reviews.Author: sharonmid
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this Quality Inn on May 16th, took my own bed pillow since I have bad back, left Daytona and headed to Miami and whrn I got to Miami I realized I had left my pillow back at the Quality Inn, so I called and the the desk clerk told me to call back in the morning when house keeping was in, I called at 8am he told me to call back at 9:30 am, when I did he put me thru to housekeeping and the woman I spoke to was very ugly and rude and told me I had not left my pillow since the maid had not put it in lost and found. I asked them to ask the maid who had cleaned room 121 the day before where my pillow was at and needless to say she had the day off and couldnt be located. I called back and spoke to the manager who was nice but of no help, who would want to steal another persons pillow? they could have kept the pillow if they had just given me my pillow sham back since it belonged to my set at home. I would never stay here again since you cant trust the help, if they would steal a bed pillow think of what else they would steal. I work in the service industry and had this had happened at my establishment I would have went out of my way to help my customer locate their property.

Reviews.Title: “As advertised!”
Reviews.Author: DW1206
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel as a home base to see Daytona Beach and then drive down to Coca and see the shuttle launch live. Desk clerk was very welcoming, friendly and helpful. Rooms were newly done and very clean. Would definitely recommend this place. Good value.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: debtroe
Reviews.Content: We were passing through Daytona to Fort Lauderdale and decided to stay in Daytona on the way. After checking out some of the absolutely awful hotels on the beach, I remembered this hotel from Trip Advisor and had a coupon for 59.00 a travel coupon book. I was a little afraid that there would not be anything available with a race that weekend, but they had a few rooms and honored the coupon. (Most places on the beach would not honor the coupon) Lauren at the front desk was simply wonderful. There was a slight glich with the first room we went to and she got us into another right away. The beds were very comfortable and the rooms very clean. I would love to stay here again, and it would be awesome if we were at a race, just having to walk across the street!! The only drawback was the continental breakfast. It was very scant. They seemed to have 1-2 items of the few things they had and and would replace everything one at a time. There were literally two donuts and when one was taken they would put out one more, I grabbed one of the two bagels and decided to go out to breakfast. This was not a big deal, but would have loved at least some coffee, but they were out of that and did not refill it while we were there. I would definately stay here again and hope to soon.

Reviews.Title: “Started out great left disappointed”
Reviews.Author: Jettsetter
Reviews.Content: Stayed 3 nights fairly new hotel, rooms very nice and clean. After 1st night we asked to be moved as the room was next to stairway to 2nd floor constant noise and people having arguments outside in the carpark all night, reception moved us to a new room inside just a nice as previous room. 2nd day the room was only half cleaned no new towels bed just thrown together with pillows all over the bed and sheet all creased under covers no new toiletries, coffee or cups, very disappointed as initial impression was very good. Breakfast okay usual waffle maker bagels cherios coffee . Rates were not the cheapest for motel accomodation - unfortunately some undesirable customers and poor housekeeping left a sour taste..

Reviews.Title: “perfect hotel on international speedway daytona beach”
Reviews.Author: wal-marty
Reviews.Content: First of all I'd like to say that the location was perfect, close to everything that daytona has to offer.Literally walking distance to the speedway, we could not have hoped for a better locale. From the time we checked in with Rita-Patricia, at the front desk, we knew we would be having a wonderful stay.She was very informative and knowledgable about both the hotel, as well as the attractions in the area.We personally followed her suggestion to visit St. Augustine, and were so glad we did. The entrance had such a nice feel to it, sort of like a coffee-shop bistro for vacationers and businessmen alike. After our wonderful conversation with Rita-Patricia, we went to put our things in the room.I expected the room to be comfortable from the initial welcoming, but it far exceeded my expectations. Not only was the room clean, it was so maticulously organized and set up with beautiful furnature and decor, that i was hesitant in placing my things inside.My compliments to the manager, as well as the maids, for they have truly outdone themselves. We opted for the room with the king-size bed, that was inclusive of a down comforter, and the room had a fridge as well as an iron and microwave.A vanity area served as the entryway to the restroom, hairdryer included.there was a desk near the bed for my laptop, as well as the included wi-fi connection.The room was superb. The next morning after our visit to St.Augustine, our requested wake- up call was friendly and prompt.I thanked RIta-Patricia for the call, and she reminded us of the hours in which they serve breakfast. As my girlfriend prepared for our departure, I went to have some breakfast.Now, usually I end up at a hotel breakfast and they are all the same.Free continental breakfast usually amounts to come have a donut, but this was not the case.The coffee was fresh, there were donuts, but also bagels,orange juice,boiled eggs, breads,even a waffle maker.The food was prepared and set out by Iris, and she was very pleasant to talk to to.Originally I had just decided on a Bagel and coffee, but she quickly convinced me of a waffle, fresh from the iron.She even cooked it for me, even though it was nearing closing of the breakfast area.Now that may not sound like much, but bear in mind it was a self- service kitchen.And I found the gesture to be very sweet of her.We had a nice little chat as she was cleaning up and i thanked her for everything. After this we checked out, even though we wished we could have stayed.I had to write this review, hoping to give credit where credit was certainly due.I will definitely be staying there again, hopefully soon.Even though we were there for only a night, I am a firm believer that when things go so well, that the memories of a perfect vacation getaway can last a lifetime. To Rita-Patricia and Iris, thank you for all you do... Marty Myrdahl

Reviews.Title: “Quality as the name says”
Reviews.Author: marian069
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Quality Inn @ Daytona Beach on our way from Cape Canaveral to St. Augustine. The staff at the reception was very friendly and we just payed $65 for an almost new, clean and big room. The location is perfect if you want to go to the Speedway (just across the street) or to the Shopping Mall. There is no more to say. Nice place, affordable, perfect ! Thank you !

Reviews.Title: “Love Intl Speedway Quality Inn”
Reviews.Author: JKchild
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel based on the positive reviews it was given and I have to agree totally. First the clerk was very courteous and helpful. I was greeted with the biggest smile and the warmest greeting ever. Everything was explained to me in full detail. Upon opening our door, I was surprised with what I found!! Beautiful decor and a very beautiful and clean room. The decor was perfect. I loved the chocolate furniture and the carpet made for a great entrance. The bathroom was on of the cleanest I have ever seen. NO MOLD OR MILDEW ANYWHERE!! I will always stay at this hotel when visiting Daytona. I really didn't expect such QUALITY for the price I paid. My room compares and rates right up with the Hilton anyday. Keep up the good work Quality.

Reviews.Title: “Not what we were promised, but acceptable”
Reviews.Author: baloo28
Reviews.Content: Very nice overall. Large beds, though not very comfortable. The hotel website advertises wi-fi in all the rooms. There was zero signal in the room. We walked down to the lobby, and there was a separate wi-fi for just the lobby. Of course, no other guests had this complaint, so they figured it was my computer. However my computer worked fine in the lobby, so you make the call. Very clean, neat and well layed out. The continental breakfast was superb however, the lady running the show was like a Nazi. It was her way or the highway. Still good food though. All in all, if you don' t need a wi-fi signal, don't care about a pool, this Quality Inn is very good and right across from the speedway.

Reviews.Title: “My new hotel in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: neptunenavigator
Reviews.Content: I travel to Daytona frequently, and decided to try this hotel over my usual accomodations. I will certainly stay here from now on during my trips. The rooms were very clean, and most importantly for me, the bed was extremely comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Love this Inn”
Reviews.Author: honzgrl
Reviews.Content: My husband and I loved this Inn. It was clean and had great bed linens and comfy pillow top mattresses. It was very stylish and updated. I recommend this Inn to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay at this Quality Motel”
Reviews.Author: seniortravelor
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay. The rooms were neat, clean and very appealing. There were both a refrigerator and microwave for our use. The room was so well insulated that we hear no noise outside of the room. There is a breakfast available in the morning, however you need to be there before 9:00 am or you are out of luck. Other then this problem we enjoyed staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Best 2 star hotel you'll probably find”
Reviews.Author: kimberlina01
Reviews.Content: OK THIS IS A 2 STAR HOTEL. Keep that in mind. If you are looking for a super cheap place that is not really creepy then this is the place. It was pretty clean. Yeah the corners were suspect and the shower had a teensy mildew smell. But the sheets were clean and the bed comfortable which is all that matters. The rooms were very spacious. The pictures here are pretty accurate. Also it is directly across the street from the speedway and i gather that is the only reason for staying here. The place resembles a motel. The breakfast consisted of Cofee, tea, OJ, cereal, bagels, toast and packaged doughnuts. Like i said it is good for cheap.

Reviews.Title: “Daytona 500 Race!!!!”
Reviews.Author: rndyhand
Reviews.Content: This year for the Daytona 500 we wanted to stay around the daytona international speedway and found this hotel across from track. The room was comfortable but the location was excellent!!!! The hotel manager had a welcome BBQ for all the guests and we really enjoyed the race. One thing we didnt find out until we got to the race was that you could not bring a cooler in. All in all, we really had fun in Daytona!!!! Great Place!!!! Randy

Reviews.Title: “Bruce at the front office was great help to us.”
Reviews.Author: SarahLD
Reviews.Content: On Nov. 23, 2006 we stayed at the Travelodge in Daytona Beach. Bruce the desk clerk assisted us in finding an apartment locator in the area. We are now in an apartment and wanted to thank the motel for their help!! Sarah Long

Reviews.Title: “Traveler's Beware”
Reviews.Author: Showmeit
Reviews.Content: My husband and another couple stayed at the Travelodge @ the Speedway in Daytona Beach Florida, just across the street from the Daytona Speedway 11/24 through 11/27. We drove almost 11 hours at night on Wednesday for a early Thursday check-in. We arrived @ 6:15AM and were told by the rude night manager that we could not check-in until 2:00PM - no exceptions. We waited until 7:00AM when the office opened and were greeted by a very nice young man that told us we could check-in immediately. Go figure!! We actually came to Daytona for a Annual Car Show that is held at the Speedway and for a nice relaxing Thansgiving. We were very disappointed that our $150.00 a night room was in the shape that it was in. No small refrigerator, no iron, no towels, no hand soap, etc. After asking for towels we received 2 bath towels, 1 bath mat and no wash cloths. You would have expected that if 4 people are in a room, more towels would have been given. The hotel itself must not be very sound proof, because there was conversation outside our room that we could hear every word. On our second day there we were greeted bright and early by a maid that was probably the rudest that I have ever seen. She was very upset that the one towel that we were given was being used to dry off our show car. Mind you, this car had no dirt, or grime on it. As a matter of fact we washed and waxed it, at a car wash off the hotel premises just the morning before. The towels were jerked from my friends hand and we were told that we were the most inconsiderate people she had ever met. Mind you, this towel was not a top of the line towel to begin with. I'm sure it is a challenge to keep up with these due to theft and ignorance from other patrons but we are not children. I think this could have been handled in a much better fashion. Our next request for towels, we received 4 bath mats to dry off on. Was told by the manager that this was all they had left. Again you would think that our room would have been fully stocked with towels for 4 adults. The parking was a nightmare each evening. Patrons that had driven car haulers were allowed to park their trucks anywhere. Most of them took up at least 5 or 6 spaces. This left no spaces for the guests to park. I got the feeling that we not appreciated and with such treatment will will not stay at this establishment again and will advise all of our friends the same advice.

HotelInfo.Name: Quality Inn Daytona Speedway
HotelInfo.Address: 2250 International Speedway Blvd, Daytona Beach, FL 32114
